detail_desc: Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.

Long, padded parka in a cotton weave with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a single back vent with a drawstring. Lined.

Long, padded parka in a cotton weave with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a single back vent with a drawstring. Lined.

Round-necked blouse in a crinkled weave with lace details. Opening at the front with braided ties, frill trims and inset hemstitching down the front and back and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Long, wide sleeves with a frilled, hemstitched seam and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Sturdy bag in imitation leather with one shorter shoulder strap in imitation leather and one longer, metal chain shoulder strap. Both straps are detachable. Flap with a snap lock at the front. The bag is divided into two sections, one of which fastens with a press-stud and the other with a zip. One inner compartment. Unlined. Size 7.5x15x23 cm.

Pouch bag in crushed velvet with a reversible sequin pattern, drawstring at the top and detachable, metal chain shoulder strap. One inner pocket with a zip. Satin lining. Size 25x28 cm.

Set with a bodysuit, shorts and hat in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Hat with an all-over print and ears.

Set with a bodysuit and shorts in organic cotton. Short-sleeved bodysuit with a print motif on the front, lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Mittens in a soft knit with a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Single-breasted jacket in a checked cotton weave with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, concealed buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and legs with printed stripes down the sides.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Checked trousers in a cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly with a button, side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Double-layered hat and tube scarf in soft, printed jersey.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt resembling a rope and a zip fly with two buttons. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt resembling a rope and a zip fly with two buttons. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
